com.inqwell.any.connect

Class ServerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inqwell.any.AbstractAny
      • com.inqwell.any.connect.ServerConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Any, Serializable

    public class ServerConnection
extends AbstractAny
    A connection to a Inq server for synchronous request/response. This class may be used in a web container to support connections to an Inq server.
    Author:
    tom
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerConnection

        public ServerConnection(StringI url,
                        StringI user,
                        StringI passwd,
                        StringI inqPackage,
                        boolean trust)
                 throws AnyException
        Connect to the specified Inq server. The url identifies the server and must specify the speakinq or speakinqs protocol. The user, passwd and package are required credentials to the login procedure.
        Parameters:
        url - a string of the form speakinq://my.host.com:1234
        user - the login user
        passwd - the login password
        inqPackage - the package to log in as
        trust - whether to trust a self-signed or expired certificate when using a secure connection
        Throws:
        AnyException

      • ServerConnection

        public ServerConnection(String url,
                        String user,
                        String passwd,
                        String inqPackage,
                        boolean trust)
                 throws AnyException
        Connect to the specified Inq server. The url identifies the server and must specify the speakinq or speakinqs protocol. The user, passwd and package are required credentials to the login procedure.
        Parameters:
        url - a string of the form speakinq://my.host.com:1234
        user - the login user
        passwd - the login password
        inqPackage - the package to log in as
        trust - whether to trust a self-signed or expired certificate when using a secure connection
        Throws:
        AnyException

    • Method Detail

      • request

        public Any request(String service,
                   String sPackage,
                   Map<String,String> args,
                   int timeout)
            throws AnyException
        Make a service request to the connected server and wait for a response. The named service in the specified package will be invoked.
        Parameters:
        service - the service to invoke
        sPackage - the package in which the service resides
        args - the service arguments, or null if no arguments are given
        timeout - in ms to await response from Inq server TODO: when instances are properly pooled synchronized can be removed...
        Throws:
        AnyException
